item.title: Inside the Survival Kids multiplayer network infrastructure
item.description: 🚀 This summer, Survival Kids launched on Nintendo Switch™ 2, built on Unity 6. A small, experienced team of about 10 developers led the project, utilizing their extensive knowledge to navigate challenges effectively. 🕹️ The game’s multiplayer network supports various play styles: single-player, local co-op, and online. item.title: How Unity Audience Hub helps marketers reach mobile gaming audiences and gains industry recognition
item.description: Unity Audience Hub is transforming how marketers engage with mobile gaming audiences while prioritizing privacy. 🎮✨ This innovative platform integrates insights from Unity’s ad ecosystem with third-party data, enabling custom audience building across mobile and CTV channels. item.title: Games made with Unity: August 2025 in review
item.description: 🎮 August 2025 showcased a diverse range of games made with Unity, from the roguelite Starlight Re:Volver to the cozy Tiny Bookshop. 🏆 Congratulations to the IGF finalists and winners, especially Consume Me for their three awards! 📅 Check out the latest Unity games on our Steam Curator page and share your projects with us! #UnityGames #IndieDev #GameAwards #GameDevelopment #Unity3D

item.title: Graphics and rendering tips from Survival Kids
item.description: 🚀 This summer, Unity launched the co-op game “Survival Kids,” developed in-house with a small team. With limited resources, they focused on innovative graphics and rendering techniques. 🌟 Using the Universal Render Pipeline, they balanced artistic goals with performance needs. Custom shaders and dynamic lighting were key to achieving their visual style. 🌊 The ocean rendering was inspired by existing projects, utilizing signed distance fields for unique effects.
